book.synopsis:
It was January 2021, and Rick Deckard had a license to kill.
Somewhere among the hordes of humans out there, lurked several rogue androids. Deckard"s assignmet--find them and then...
book.title_long: Blade Runner (Do Androids Dream of Electric Sheep)
